snippet: The Suomi N.P.P. satellite is carrying five instruments, the biggest of which, the "Visible/Infrared Imager Radiometer Suite," took the photos that were used to create a composite image.
abstract: The Suomi N.P.P. satellite is carrying five instruments, the biggest of which, the "Visible/Infrared Imager Radiometer Suite," took the photos that were used to create a composite image.
lead_paragraph: Suomi N.P.P., the first of a new generation of observational satellites, produces a striking composite image of the Earth. [The Raleigh Telegram]

headline.main: On Our Radar: A Crisp View of Earth
